title: In which ship did Amerigo discover America? - Quora
tags: History of the United States of America

response.answer_text: Amerigo didn’t discover America. Amerigo Vespucci was a cartographer who mapped the North American continent and named the land America, after him.
Columbus was well ahead of Amerigo Vespucci in the European exploration of the New World, first arriving in 1492. Vespucci joined as an observer on several voyages to S. America around 1500.
